channel.title: Better runserver
channel.description: Hey guys, you will notice m posting for help alot of the time :) i've been trying to get better at coding... anyways... here goes... i need a runserver or compiler or voule which will run my server for about a day... the voule i have now shuts down after a few hours and my compiler which runsthe server comes up with an out of memory error, wondering if anyone can point me to a new better one which will rune for about 10-24 hours. ;D thanks, much apreciated.

item.title: Better runserver
item.dc:creator: @jj_boss jj boss
item.description:
@jj_boss wrote:

thanks… well the runserver says error java out of memory… so, yeh how was i to know? and its happened for when i used to just download the servers, but now i got one and want to build from it… reading few tuts lately… trying stuff out. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 29, 2007, 10:14:29 AM[/size][hr]… but i put this… where? my compiler?

Read full topic

item.title: Better runserver
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

@echo off
TITLE Run
java -cp .;./jython.jar -Xmx1024m server
pause

Tbh.

The server uptime is not based on the runserver lol, it’s your server. Server.java/client/player, where most of the errors occur.

Read full topic
